Routes¶

AuthRoute¶

This route consists of all the APIs which would be responsible for login-signup and authentication modules. All the authenticating strategies, signup and login modules are implemented within this routes.

ReviewRoute¶

All the APIs for reviewroute pipeline are implemented within this file. This file consists of all the APIs, responsible for all the GET and POST request made through the respective features-list.

DraftRoute¶

This file consists of all the APIs which are responsible for all the GET and POST requests pass through the respective features-list. All the APIs routing are mentioned using the GET and POST request and their detailed implementation are implemented using their respective controller file.
